Definition: This task is about completing a partial Catalan sentence. Initially, we need to come up with a Catalan sentence with more than two words. Then we will split the sentence somewhere in the middle, making sure that the left and right parts have at least one word. So, here given the left part, we need to predict the right part of the sentence. We only need Catalan sentences, so don't use any other languages.
